metadata.name: JScript Compiler Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of the "jsc.exe" (JScript Compiler). Attacker might abuse this in order to compile JScript files on the fly and bypassing application whitelisting.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\jsc.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('jsc.exe'))

output.summary: Detects the execution of the "jsc.exe" (JScript Compiler). Attacker might abuse this in order to compile JScript files on the fly and bypassing application whitelisting.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use to compile JScript by developers. References: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Jsc/, https://www.phpied.com/make-your-javascript-a-windows-exe/, https://twitter.com/DissectMalware/status/998797808907046913
